title: Inox Wind bags 51 MW order from Everrenew
description: Inox Wind announced securing a 51 MW equipment supply order from Everrenew Energy Private Ltd for their latest 3 MW Wind Turbine Generators, with additional post-commissioning operations & maintenance services. It aimsnto establish a long-term partnership. The financial details were not disclosed, and the project will be executed in Tamil Nadu, aligning with Everrenew's commitment to sustainable renewable power solutions to meet increasing power demands.
